second_sentence: 24.Institutions should also consider the non-exhaustive list of situations in paragraph 23 when    assessing connections among shadow banking entities. 16 Institutions should give due    consideration to the fact that relationships between entities falling under the definition of    shadow banking entities will most likely consist not of equity ties but rather of a different type of    relationship, i.e. situations of de facto control or relationships characterised by contractual    obligations, implicit support or potential reputational risk (e.g. sponsorship or even branding).
